inclusion.criterion: Born at full term of pregnancy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent form had been signed and dated by the parent or other legally acceptable representative.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participant and parent/guardian were able to attend all scheduled visits and to be complied with all trial procedures.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical trial investigating a vaccine, drug, medical device, or medical procedure in the 4 weeks preceding the first trial vaccination.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of any vaccine in the 4 weeks preceding the first trial vaccination.
exclusion.label: not_met
